channel.title: Epolicy on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Epolicy on SoftLayer API

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Details
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Details Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Details data type represents a virus scan agent and contains details about its version. Local agentVersion Version number of the anti-virus scan agent. Type: string lastUpdate The date of the last time the anti-virus agent checked in. Type: string Relational currentPolicy The current anti-virus policy of an agent. Type: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Parent_Details

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Details
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Details Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Details data type represents a virus scan agent and contains details about its version. Local agentVersion Version number of the anti-virus scan agent. Type: string lastUpdate The date of the last time the anti-virus agent checked in. Type: string Relational currentPolicy The current anti-virus policy of an agent. Type: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Parent_Details

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Parent_Details
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Parent_Details Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Parent_Details data type contains the name of an anti-virus policy. Local name The name of a policy. Type: string Relational currentPolicy The current anti-virus policy of an agent. Type: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Parent_Details Count

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Parent_Details
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Parent_Details Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Parent_Details data type contains the name of an anti-virus policy. Local name The name of a policy. Type: string Relational currentPolicy The current anti-virus policy of an agent. Type: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Parent_Details

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event data type represents a single anti-virus event. It contains details about the event such as the date the event occurred, the virus that is detected and the action that is taken. Local eventLocalDateTime The date when an anti-virus event occurs. Type: dateTime filename Name of the file found to be infected. Type: string

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event data type represents a single anti-virus event. It contains details about the event such as the date the event occurred, the virus that is detected and the action that is taken. Local eventLocalDateTime The date when an anti-virus event occurs. Type: dateTime filename Name of the file found to be infected. Type: string virusName The name of a virus that is found.

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event_AccessProtection
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event_AccessProtection Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event_AccessProtection data type represents an access protection event. It contains details about the event such as when it occurs, the process that caused it, and the rule that triggered the event. Local eventLocalDateTime The date that an access protection event occurs. Type: dateTime filename The name of the file that was protected from access. Type: string

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event_AccessProtection
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event_AccessProtection Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event_AccessProtection data type represents an access protection event. It contains details about the event such as when it occurs, the process that caused it, and the rule that triggered the event. Local eventLocalDateTime The date that an access protection event occurs. Type: dateTime filename The name of the file that was protected from access. Type: string

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event_Filter_Description
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event_Filter_Description Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event_Filter_Description data type contains the name of the rule that was triggered by an anti-virus event. Local name The name of the rule that triggered an anti-virus event. Type: string

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event_Filter_Description
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event_Filter_Description Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event_Filter_Description data type contains the name of the rule that was triggered by an anti-virus event. Local name The name of the rule that triggered an anti-virus event. Type: string

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_BlockedApplicationEvent
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_BlockedApplicationEvent Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_BlockedApplicationEvent data type contains a single blocked application event. The details of the event are the time the event occurred, the process that generated the event and a brief description of the application that was blocked. Local applicationDescription A brief description of the application that is blocked. Type: string incidentTime The time that an application is blocked.

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_BlockedApplicationEvent
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_BlockedApplicationEvent Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_BlockedApplicationEvent data type contains a single blocked application event. The details of the event are the time the event occurred, the process that generated the event and a brief description of the application that was blocked. Local applicationDescription A brief description of the application that is blocked. Type: string incidentTime The time that an application is blocked. Type: dateTime

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_Event_Signature
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_Event_Signature Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_Event_Signature data type contains the signature name of a rule that generated an IPS event. Local signatureName The name of a rule that triggered an IPS event. Type: string

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_Event_Signature
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_Event_Signature Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_Event_Signature data type contains the signature name of a rule that generated an IPS event. Local signatureName The name of a rule that triggered an IPS event. Type: string

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_IPSEvent
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_IPSEvent Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_IPSEvent data type represents a single IPS event. It contains details about the event such as the date the event occurred, the process that generated it, the severity of the event, and the action taken. Local incidentTime The time when an IPS event occurred. Type: dateTime processName Name of the process that generated an IPS event.

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_IPSEvent

Local name The name of a policy. Type: string Relational agentDetails Additional information about an agent. Type: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version45_Agent_Details policies The current anti-virus policy of an agent. Type: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version45_Agent_Parent_Details[] Count policyCount A count of the current anti-virus policy of an agent.

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version45_Event
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version45_Event Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version45_Event data type represents a single event. It contains details about the event such as the date the event occurred, the virus or intrusion that is detected and the action that is taken. Local detectedUtc The time that an event was detected. Type: dateTime sourceIpv4 The IP address of the source that generated an event. Type: string
